title: BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Further Correspondence From QCoal
text:
BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Further Correspondence From QCoal

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 21:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Further Correspondence From QCoal Sept 16 (Reuters) - Bounty Mining Ltd : * UPDATE ON FURTHER CORRESPONDENCE FROM QCOAL * RECEIVED FURTHER CORRESPONDENCE FROM LAWYERS ACTING FOR QCOAL IN RELATION TO UNSOLICITED PROPOSAL RECEIVED FROM QCOAL * NON- INTERESTED DIRECTORS CONFIRM THAT FURTHER REVISED QCOAL PROPOSAL IS NOT A SUPERIOR PROPOSAL TO AMAROO PROPOSAL * NON-INTERESTED DIRECTORS RECOMMEND SHAREHOLDERS VOTE IN FAVOUR OF RESOLUTIONS PROPOSED ABOUT AMAROO PROPOSAL AT MEETING ON 30 SEPT 2019

BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Further Correspondence From QCoal
description: BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Further Correspondence From QCoal
